title: Singapore's Basel Medical Group ($BMGL) Plans $1B Bitcoin Buy via Share-Swap for Asia Growth
post: Basel Medical Group, a publicly traded healthcare company listed on Nasdaq under the ticker $BMGL, has announced plans to acquire $1 billion worth of Bitcoin

title: Alabama Man Sentenced to 14 Months, Ordered to Forfeit $50,000 for SEC Account Hack Using SIM Swap to Post Fake Bitcoin ETF Approval
Nine Out of 10 Banking and Fintech Executives Are Using Stablecoins or Plan To: Fireblocks
post: A survey by Fireblocks reveals a dramatic increase in the number of firms using or planning to use stablecoins for cross-border payments and faster settlement.

title: Coinbase Data Breach Reignites Debate Over Crypto Security Models
post: The breach further pressures the leading U.S crypto exchange as the SEC alleges it misstated verified user figures.

title: Fidelity Digital Assets, $5 Trillion Manager, Says Bitcoin Could Hit New All-Time High in Acceleration Phase
post: Fidelity Digital Assets, the cryptocurrency division of the $5 trillion asset manager Fidelity Investments, has indicated that Bitcoin's price could reach a new all-time high before the current market cycle concludes
